remarks.format: ## Remarks 請記住物件會儲存狀態呼叫之間。Remember that the object saves state between calls to . 當應用程式是使用資料的資料流時，它應該設定`flush`參數來`true`藉此確定的狀態資訊會排清。When the application is done with a stream of data, it should set the `flush` parameter to `true` to make sure that the state information is flushed. 使用此設定，解碼器會忽略無效的位元組資料區塊的結尾，並清除內部緩衝區。With this setting, the decoder ignores invalid bytes at the end of the data block and clears the internal buffer. 根據目前的後援設定來轉換屬於的邏輯單元，例如之高 surrogate 的 surrogate 字組，任何其餘處理過的資料。Any remaining processed data that is part of a logical unit, such as the high surrogate of a surrogate pair, is converted according to the current fallback settings. `Convert`方法設計來在迴圈中要解碼的任意數量的輸入，例如從檔案或資料流讀取的資料。The `Convert` method is designed to be used in a loop to decode an arbitrary amount of input, such as data read from a file or stream. 它會解碼作業的輸出儲存在固定大小緩衝區。It stores the output of the decoding operation in a fixed-size buffer. 如果輸出緩衝區不夠大，所以，便會擲回例外狀況，但會填滿盡可能最多空間，並傳回的位元組讀取和寫入的字元。 will throw an exception if the output buffer isn't large enough, but will fill as much space as possible and return the bytes read and chars written. 另請參閱主題的更多的註解。Also see the topic for more comments. `completed`輸出參數會指出是否在輸入緩衝區中的所有資料的轉換，並儲存在輸出緩衝區。The `completed` output parameter indicates whether all the data in the input buffer was converted and stored in the output buffer. 此參數設為`false`所指定的位元組數目`byteCount`無法轉換參數，但不超過指定的字元數目`charCount`參數。This parameter is set to `false` if the number of bytes specified by the `byteCount` parameter cannot be converted without exceeding the number of characters specified by the `charCount` parameter. 在此情況下，應用程式應該使用輸出緩衝區的內容，或提供新的輸出緩衝區，遞增值`bytes`參數所指定的位元組數目`bytesUsed`參數，然後呼叫`Convert`方法一次處理其餘的輸入。In that situation, the application should use the contents of the output buffer or provide a new output buffer, increment the `bytes` parameter by the number of bytes specified by the `bytesUsed` parameter, then call the `Convert` method again to process the remaining input. `completed`參數也可以設定為`false`，即使`bytesUsed`和`byteCount`參數是否相等。The `completed` parameter can also be set to `false`, even though the `bytesUsed` and `byteCount` parameters are equal. 如果仍有中的資料，就會發生這種情況下物件，不儲存在`bytes`緩衝區。This situation occurs if there is still data in the object that has not been stored in the `bytes` buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請記住物件會儲存狀態呼叫之間。Remember that the object saves state between calls to . 當應用程式是使用資料的資料流時，它應該設定`flush`參數來`true`藉此確定的狀態資訊會排清。When the application is done with a stream of data, it should set the `flush` parameter to `true` to make sure that the state information is flushed. 使用此設定，解碼器會忽略無效的位元組資料區塊的結尾，並清除內部緩衝區。With this setting, the decoder ignores invalid bytes at the end of the data block and clears the internal buffer. 若要計算確切的陣列大小`GetChars`需要應用程式應該使用以儲存產生的字元， 。To calculate the exact array size that `GetChars` requires to store the resulting characters, the application should use . 如果`GetChars`以呼叫`flush`設定為`false`，解碼器的內部緩衝區中儲存的資料區塊的結尾的後隨位元組，以及使用它們在下一步 的解碼作業中。If `GetChars` is called with `flush` set to `false`, the decoder stores trailing bytes at the end of the data block in an internal buffer and uses them in the next decoding operation. 應用程式應該呼叫`GetCharCount`之前呼叫的資料區塊上`GetChars`上相同的區塊，以便從上一個區塊的任何尾端位元組會包含在計算中。The application should call `GetCharCount` on a block of data immediately before calling `GetChars` on the same block, so that any trailing bytes from the previous block are included in the calculation. 如果您的應用程式是要轉換的輸入資料流的區段數目，請考慮使用方法。If your application is to convert many segments of an input stream, consider using the method. 如果輸出緩衝區不夠大，所以，便會擲回例外狀況，但會填滿盡可能最多空間，並傳回的位元組讀取和寫入的字元。 will throw an exception if the output buffer isn't large enough, but will fill as much space as possible and return the bytes read and chars written. 另請參閱主題的更多的註解。Also see the topic for more comments.
